title: Students' Motivational Development
description: I focus on identifying resources and barriers in students' learning -- individual factors (gender), or social factors (peers, teachers, family).

title: Educational Research Methodology
description: I work mostly with quantitative data, but eager for discussions related to improving how to gain insights from Educational data.

title: (Research) Career Development
description: There are so many ways to develop as a researcher, it is also always exciting to learn. I am absolutely open for a good chat about how we learn and grow!
